[00:00.00]Nobody Like U (From "Turning Red"/Soundtrack Version) - 4*TOWN/Jordan Fisher/FINNEAS/Josh Levi/Topher Ngo/Grayson Villanueva
[00:01.34]Lyrics by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish
[00:02.69]Composed by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish
[00:04.04]Yeah ooh yeah
[00:08.21]
[00:09.31]I've never met nobody like you
[00:13.82]Had friends and I've had buddies it's true
[00:18.35]But they don't turn my tummy the way you do
[00:22.93]I've never met nobody like you
[00:27.28]
[00:28.09]Oh yeah yeah
[00:33.12]
[00:36.76]You're never not on my mind oh my oh my
[00:41.29]I'm never not by your side your side your side
[00:45.71]I'm never gon' let you cry oh cry don't cry
[00:50.34]I'll never not be your ride or die alright
[00:54.45]
[00:56.00]Let's call it what it is it's a masterpiece
[00:58.24]Gotta whole lotta love for them city streets
[01:00.71]Glendale
[01:01.35]Tonight is the place to be gotta big boom-box and a new CD
[01:05.05]Come on everybody let's tear it up
[01:07.42]If you want mad skills you can share with us
[01:09.75]I want everybody to stop and stare
[01:11.90]And you know why it's me
[01:13.64]Robaire
[01:14.34]
[01:14.93]Woo uh
[01:18.09]It's too good
[01:18.83]Yeah haha
[01:19.69]
[01:21.28]Let's go
[01:21.96]
[01:22.56]You're never not on my mind oh my oh my
[01:26.95]I'm never not by your side your side your side
[01:31.53]I'm never gon' let you cry oh cry don't cry
[01:36.10]I'll never not be your ride or die alright

data.trans:
[ti:Nobody Like U (From "Turning Red")]
[ar:4*TOWN/Jordan Fisher/FINNEAS/Josh Levi/Topher Ngo/Grayson Villanueva]
[al:Nobody Like U (From "Turning Red")]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.34]//
[00:02.69]//
[00:04.04]//
[00:08.21]
[00:09.31]我从未见过像你这样的人
[00:13.82]结交朋友 我身边好友无数 这是真的
[00:18.35]但他们无法像你一样与我坦诚相待
[00:22.93]我从未见过像你这样的人
[00:27.28]
[00:28.09]//
[00:33.12]
[00:36.76]你的身影在我脑海中挥之不去 我的天啊
[00:41.29]我永远陪伴着你
[00:45.71]我永远不会让你伤心落泪
[00:50.34]我会是你赴汤蹈火的挚友
[00:54.45]
[00:56.00]让我们将这一切视为杰作吧
[00:58.24]对这些城市街道情有独钟
[01:00.71]//
[01:01.35]今晚将成为欢乐的世界 准备好大大的音响和一张新的CD
[01:05.05]大家一起来吧 让我们尽情狂欢
[01:07.42]如果你想一展风采 秒杀全场 你可以与我们一同分享
[01:09.75]我渴望每个人都能驻足凝望
[01:11.90]你知道缘由 这就是我
[01:13.64]//
[01:14.34]
[01:14.93]//
[01:18.09]一切都分外美好
[01:18.83]//
[01:19.69]
[01:21.28]让我们出发吧
[01:21.96]

[01:26.95]我永远陪伴着你
[01:31.53]我永远不会让你伤心落泪
[01:36.10]我会是你赴汤蹈火的挚友
